author: Maighna Nanu, Maighna Nanu
title: Police officer wears coronavirus helmet to urge people to stay inside during India lockdown
description: Dressed as the deadly virus, he says: 'If you come out, I will come in'
content:
An Indian police officer is wearing a coronavirus helmet to try and warn people to stay indoors during the lockdown period. 
Rajesh Babu, a police inspector from Chennai, India, dons the specially designed coronavirus helmet while on patrol to caution people… [+1750 chars]
